Downfall is a poignant drama about a man struggling with addiction and his life choices. It's a beautifully shot and emotionally resonant film with a powerful performance from Juliane Köhler.

Restless is a quirky and heartwarming film about a group of friends who take a vacation to a remote cabin. It's a perfect escape into a world of freedom and laughter.
